title: Fragment, late 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic threads
Technique: embroidered on satin weave
description: Fragment of narrow trimming of purple satin embroidered with small flowers and Buddhist symbols  in white, blue, and green silks. Backed with pink silk plain weave.
